name: SPELL SAM SPELL! SPELLING GAME FOR KIDS
name_original: SPELL SAM SPELL! SPELLING GAME FOR KIDS
description:
Spell Sam Spell is a unique spelling game for children in which you play an endless runner with a twist, you must spell words correctly in order to win.Players must select a sequence of alphabets correctly in order to complete spelling of a word.

They get rewarded with mini-games of gold and jewel pick-ups which lets them buy cool gizmos and gadgets such as astronaut suits, helicopters and gold cars.

500+ words are supplied which are designed to increase your child's vocabulary in a structured manner
Children learn whilst having tons of arcade fun with ten challenging levels and increasing amount of difficulty as they progress.
Designed for ages 4-6 , your kids will love this fresh take on games and spelling!
We are adding content every month, so do send feedback on the game to info@appymonkeys.com
